Sentencas: This study proposes a novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands that combines a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), a geothermal source, and a thermoelectric generator (TEG) to achieve enhanced performance.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment

Sentencas: The system is subjected to exergo-economic examination and optimization to determine its thermal performance and cost-effectiveness.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment

Sentencas: Integrating geothermal energy with SOFC can help reduce waste heat and improve overall system performance.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment

Sentencas: Based on the results, it is determined that the cooling system can generate 161.3 kW for building purposes, and the integrated turbine in the cooling system can also produce 891.9 kW of electrical output.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment

Sentencas: The integrated thermoelectric generator modules produce 418.06 kW. Moreover, hybrid sys-tems' energy and exergy efficiencies are 23.29 % and 19.26 %.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment

Sentencas: The case study of the introduced system indicates that by variation of parameters, the systems have different behaviors from thermodynamic and cost points of view.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment

Sentencas: Therefore, multi-criteria optimum finding according to the genetic algorithm is conducted.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment

Sentencas: The optimi-zation results present that in the selected optimal state while using the ideal state, the net output power and overall cost rate are 193307.12 kW and 77.96 $/h.
Titulo: A novel geothermal source integrated system to meet the building demands: Exergo-economic and optimization assessment
